list.definition:
SELECT 'Dashboard' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 5 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'General Settings' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 1 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Device Locations' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 2 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Reports' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 2 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alarms' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 3 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost');
list.name: getPannels
list.query:
SELECT 'Dashboard' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 5 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'General Settings' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 1 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Device Locations' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 2 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Reports' AS access
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 2 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alarms' AS access

WHERE (role <= 3 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost');

list.definition:
select
case
when '${getPannels}' = 'Dashboard' then 'dadcde76-fafe-4e62-81c2-569dc8a101c3'
when '${getPannels}' = 'General Settings' then 'dc32e257-3a80-44c6-b04e-8dcddbe61430'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Device Locations' then 'd3f55778-92a4-4b02-b885-ec56e04b6e41'
when '${getPannels}' = 'Alarms' then 'e837ab4d-0bb5-4cbc-83b3-6a1d8b59f7a2'
when '${getPannels}' = Reports' then 'f75e42aa-b555-4d29-b2f7-817968f7264a'
else 'dadcde76-fafe-4e62-81c2-569dc8a101c3'
end
FROM `db-teg-test1`.users
WHERE (role <= 3 OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost') 
  AND (email = '${__user.email}' OR '${__user.email}' = 'admin@localhost');
